data.message: I was told that this competition is only for US only.  Well, I want to share mine anyway.  Every album he has been featured in or put out, including Slim Shady EP and Soul Intent.  2 signed coa mics, vinyls of Infinite and SSEP.  Signed Rolling stones magazine.  Shirts and posters not in pic.  I think this is everything.

replies.message: Umm nope, I must be forgetting those as I am not sure what 8 Mile shoes are.

The white pair on the left are called "Shady Burst", on the tongue is written "Air Slim Shady".  I'm not sure how many pairs are out there but they are limited edition released in 2003.  The pair on the right are Shady Records Air Force 1, released in 2004 to celebrate the release of Encore.
